mapper.sql: id, frame_name, `number`, factory_id, mine_id, create_time, update_time, is_delete, detailed
mapper.insert: insert into frame_setting (frame_name, `number`, factory_id, mine_id, create_time, update_time, is_delete, detailed) values (#{frameName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detailed,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into frame_setting
frame_name,
`number`,
factory_id,
mine_id,
create_time,
update_time,
is_delete,
detailed,

mapper.update:
update frame_setting
frame_name = #{frameName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`number` = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
factory_id = #{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mine_id = #{mineId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
detailed = #{detailed,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update frame_setting set frame_name = #{frameName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `number` = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, factory_id = #{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mine_id = #{mineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, detailed = #{detailed,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update frame_setting set is_delete = 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT frame_setting.id, frame_setting.frame_name, frame_setting.number, frame_setting.factory_id, frame_setting.mine_id, frame_setting.is_delete, frame_setting.create_time, frame_setting.update_time, frame_setting.detailed, factory_house.factory_name, mine_setting.mine_name FROM frame_setting, factory_house, mine_setting
frame_setting.is_delete = 0
AND ( frame_setting.frame_name like #{keyWord} or frame_setting.number like #{keyWord})
AND frame_setting.factory_id = factory_house.id AND frame_setting.mine_id = mine_setting.id
select id,frame_name,number FROM frame_setting where factory_id=#{factoryId} AND is_delete=0
